long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Nowadays, the screen of desktop devices is getting wider and wider. How to make full use of the wasted space on both sides of the screen has also become a question worth thinking about.

The main function:
Automatically recognize long articles, re-column layout at 32 words per line, change to column + horizontal scrolling reading, just like reading newspaper when I was a kid.

operating:
Escape: If the page is misplaced, you can restore it with Escape
Scrolling: The scroll wheel is half a screen, and page elements automatically scroll horizontally first
Click: Scroll to read the current article
